articles.author: Tom Pyman
articles.title: Holidaymakers jam Faro airport to fly home before quarantine deadline - Daily Mail
articles.description: Anyone arriving back in the UK from the southern European country after that time will have to self-isolate for 10 days following its removal from the green travel list.
articles.content:
Holidaymakers today jammed Faro airport in a bid to fly home from Portugal before Tuesday's 4am quarantine deadline.
Anyone arriving back in the UK from the southern European country after that time… [+58045 chars]

articles.title: Canada looking to U.S. to help end Moderna delivery delays - 680 News
articles.description: Procurement Minister Anita Anand says Canada is trying to negotiate a deal to start getting doses of Moderna's COVID-19 vaccine from the United States instead of Europe.
articles.content:
Procurement Minister Anita Anand says Canada is trying to negotiate a deal to start getting doses of Moderna’s COVID-19 vaccine from the United States instead of Europe.
All 5.7 million doses delive… [+3880 chars]
